name: Petzl Djinn Straight Gate Carabiner
description: A good carabiner for those learning to climb outside. The large gate is easy to operate even when you're starting to feel the pump.H-shape cross section reduces weight and offers an impressive strength to weight ratio.Wide contact surfaces allow the rope to glide and reduce wear on the carabiner.Keylock nose for unhindered, no-snag clipping.
